name: Sweet Advantage
description:
***!!! THIS GAME IS UNFINISHED DUE TO SOME UNFORTUNATE TECHNICAL DIFFICULTIES !!!***

(We didn't reach our intended goal, but we got far enough that we didn't want to *not* atleast submit something. That's how it goes sometimes!)

(The following text is a description of what we were going for:)

You and your “friend” are the two worst students in the most prestigious baking university in the world.

You have one last chance to prove that you can make something worthwhile, or, atleast, make sure that your “friends” cake ends up way worse than yours, as they say, all is fair in love and war!

-----------------------------------------------------------------

Sweet Advantage is a local-multiplayer "cake sabotaging game".

The objective of the game is to drop various, un-cake-like, objects into each other’s cakes, making sure that your cake is the least disgusting by the end of it. Least worst cake wins in the end!

Gamepad Controls (recommended): 

Left stick = Move

A: Use 

B: Drop

Hold B: Throw

Keyboard controls:

WASD = Move

H = Use

J = Drop

(Pick up ingredients and "use" them at your desk, when you have gathered the right ingredients (was supposed to be indicated in the UI) you can start the baking process. Baking is done by button mashing the A button /  H key)) 

-----------------------------------------------------------------

Made by ODS team for UE4jam (winter 2019), theme: All's fair in love and war.

All assets made from scratch for this game jam.
